title: Whole Learning Theory-Based STEM Education Instructional Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic STEM education concepts and fundamental instructional design principles
context.additional_context: Environment emphasizing collaboration and reflective activities using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze instructional design requirements in STEM education contexts
Learners can generate creative instructional design ideas through internal and external interactions
Learners can develop differentiated instructional design strategies considering gender-sensitive perspectives

resources: Digital Collaboration Tools (Google Workspace, Miro, etc.)
Instructional design templates and assessment rubrics

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
